title: xDai chain concurrent JSON RPC call issue
body:
2019-11-05 22:08:37.9712|23|Error during method execution, request: ID 1, version 2.0, eth_call({
  "to": "0xeeb511b470859ba8a416288c5ba4b8218160a3c7",
  "data": "0xb1c9fe6e"
},latest)|Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
2019-11-05 22:08:37.9712|23|Failed to respond to eth_call System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Nethermind.Store.TrieNode.ResolveNode(PatriciaTree tree, Boolean allowCaching) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/TrieNode.cs:line 215
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.TraverseBranch(TrieNode node, TraverseContext traverseContext) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 438
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.TraverseNode(TrieNode node, TraverseContext traverseContext) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 324
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.Run(Span`1 updatePath, Int32 nibblesCount, Byte[] updateValue, Boolean isUpdate, Boolean ignoreMissingDelete, Keccak rootHash) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 303
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.Get(Span`1 rawKey, Keccak rootHash) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 226
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.GetState(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 549
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.GetAndAddToCache(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 568
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.AccountExists(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 89
   at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessor.Execute(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer, Boolean readOnly) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/TransactionProcessor.cs:line 120
   at Nethermind.Facade.BlockchainBridge.Call(BlockHeader blockHeader, Transaction transaction) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Facade/BlockchainBridge.cs:line 192
   at Nethermind.JsonRpc.Modules.Eth.EthModule.eth_call(TransactionForRpc transactionCall, BlockParameter blockParameter) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.JsonRpc/Modules/Eth/EthModule.cs:line 297|
2019-11-05 22:08:37.9726|45|Error during method execution, request: ID 1, version 2.0, eth_call({
  "to": "0x75acc06a7f81aa8e08db21c8862094ef927329df",
  "data": "0xb1c9fe6e"
},latest)|Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
2019-11-05 22:08:37.9726|45|Failed to respond to eth_call System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Nethermind.Store.TrieNode.ResolveNode(PatriciaTree tree, Boolean allowCaching) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/TrieNode.cs:line 215
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.TraverseBranch(TrieNode node, TraverseContext traverseContext) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 438
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.TraverseNode(TrieNode node, TraverseContext traverseContext) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 324
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.Run(Span`1 updatePath, Int32 nibblesCount, Byte[] updateValue, Boolean isUpdate, Boolean ignoreMissingDelete, Keccak rootHash) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 303
   at Nethermind.Store.PatriciaTree.Get(Span`1 rawKey, Keccak rootHash) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/PatriciaTree.cs:line 226
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.GetState(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 549
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.GetAndAddToCache(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 568
   at Nethermind.Store.StateProvider.AccountExists(Address address) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Store/StateProvider.cs:line 89
   at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessor.Execute(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer, Boolean readOnly) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Evm/TransactionProcessor.cs:line 120
   at Nethermind.Facade.BlockchainBridge.Call(BlockHeader blockHeader, Transaction transaction) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Facade/BlockchainBridge.cs:line 192
   at Nethermind.JsonRpc.Modules.Eth.EthModule.eth_call(TransactionForRpc transactionCall, BlockParameter blockParameter) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.JsonRpc/Modules/Eth/EthModule.cs:line 297|
